'''Green Resilience''' is [[Traveler (Dendro)]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

== Gameplay Notes ==

* The Lea Lotus Lamp's duration is increased to '''15''' seconds.
* The Lea Lotus Lamp in its original state or after {{Hydro}} transformation now hit the enemies a total of '''10''' times.
* The Lea Lotus Lamp after {{Electro}} transformation now hit the enemies a total of '''16''' times.
